TopicTitle: Unable to finish contract on Gilly

Articles.Content:
OK so I checked the known bugs n stuff so I apologise if this has been reported already. I got a temperature scan contract for Gilly and one of the parts needed me to scan near a point above 6400m which turns out to be in high space over Gilly so you can't log the temperature. It's the one in the middle for 7-EKS. I was in the area and only just above 6400m. Looks like the contract parameters might need a little extra tweaking.

I'm posting it here as it is a stock contract with parameters outside stock planetary ranges rather than an actual bug per se, please move to modded installs if that is the right place. 

Here is a screenshot, sorry for the huge size.

![qOV9sR7.png](http://i.imgur.com/qOV9sR7.png)

EDIT : Just checked and the highest I can get and still be in space near gilly is 5999m

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T22:57:30Z" title="02/22/2015 10:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by John FX**

Yeah, it's a bug, Arsonide knows, for now though all we can do is use the debug menu to complete the contract, sorry.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-25T21:48:11Z" title="02/25/2015 09:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 25, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**

Cool. As long as it is known. Didn't think of using the debug menu, was going to RP it as a less than competent mission control.

I'll be aware now that 6km is the max on Gilly so I'll decline those.

Thank you Sal.
